hours_text:
##### LOCATION

##### 161 Calhoun Street

##### Charleston, SC 29401

##### 843.953.4422

##### Our mailing address for USPS is:

##### Halsey Institute of Contemporary Art

##### 161 Calhoun Street

##### Charleston, SC 29424

##### If you are sending mail using Fedex or UPS, please use this address:

##### Halsey Institute of Contemporary Art

##### 161 Calhoun Street, Suite 117

##### Charleston, SC 29401

##### 843.953.4422

ALWAYS FREE AND OPEN TO THE PUBLIC

##### GALLERY HOURS

##### _The Halsey Institute of Contemporary Art is closed to changeover the galleries for Young Contemporaries 2026. Join us as we reset for a New Year, Free-for-all communal art-making and supplies exchange event on Thursday, January 8, 6 - 8:30PM._  
**  
DURING EXHIBITIONS  
11:00 AM – 4:00 PM Monday - Saturday  
11:00 AM – 7:00 PM on Thursdays  
Closed on Sundays **  
  
**Free guided group tours are available. Find out more[here](https://halsey.charleston.edu/learn/)!**  
  
Admission to the galleries is free and subsidized by our Members' generous support. Find out more about Membership [here!](https://halsey.charleston.edu/sustain/join/)  
  
**[Click here](https://map.charleston.edu/?id=2132#!ce/77192?ct/77181,77200,77201,79422,85390?s/) for a map of the parking garages and accessible parking spaces and entrances near our galleries.**

##### **PARKING:** There are many nearby places to park your bicycle or car! Click the map below to enlarge [+]

[](https://halsey.charleston.edu/wp-conte...
